column3: The commit summary's not very specific - the change does speak for itself when you're looking at a diff but the logs get read a lot more often than the diffs. What about something like "bitcoin-cli.cpp: Use symbolic constant for exit code"\n
Agree with @kazcw, the commit message needs to be explanatory. It's mentioned in the contributing guidelines https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#contributor-workflow\n
